Perreux variation. I have been looking at this line a lot more lately. The other options are the Max Lange(which i enjoy) and the main line 5. 0-0 5. Nxe4 6. Re1 6. d5 7. Bxd5 7. Qxd5 8. Nc3 8. Qa5(or h5) and 9. Nxe4 (which i do not).
